name: Sokoblox
description:
https://github.com/SED4906/sokoblox

WASD or the Arrow keys move, R resets, Z undos. You can push the white boxes off to create new floor. Get to the green tile while upright to complete a level. Put boxes on all blue tiles before then, otherwise orange tiles create new boxes instead.

Bloxorz is a Flash game in which you solve 33 puzzles as a rolling rectangular prism.

Sokoban is a genre of games in which you push boxes to storage locations.

The larger aim of this project is to make a game in Godot every week, work on this game started on a Tuesday, 2022-06-07.

This is the first release. I created 15 puzzles in that time, and I intend to add more in the future.

The trailer video is a minute long and shows the mechanics of the game.
